q: `` Mike Pence has demonstrated the ability to enthusiastically advance the cause of conservatives and constitutional, limited government, and for that reason I am encouraging him to get in the race,'' Jim Ryun said. One, he actually has a track record of speaking truth to power, standing up to his own party's leadership on the things that have tarnished the Republican brand, such as the vast expansion of entitlement benefits and the TARP, Benko said in an interview, speaking of the bank bailout known as the Troubled Asset Relief Program.`` Two, he is absolutely, unflinchingly conservative. He does not trim his message to his audience

LOS ANGELES( AP)- Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series`` The X Factor'' to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow`` American Idol'' judge.`` I've always said at some point we are going to be working together.'' This is the cloud-based version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer .`` Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
